summary: Frankenstein!AU Armitage Hux x Rose TicoIn his secret laboratory, Hux resurrected a dead girl. He gave her a new name, Rose.Rose...
caption:
Frankenstein!AU Armitage Hux x Rose Tico

In his secret laboratory, Hux resurrected a dead girl. 
He gave her a new name, Rose.
Rose does not remember her past, so Hux helps her to adapt in a new life.

blog.name: basada-en-la-esperanza
blog.title: Rebellions are built on hope.
blog.description: About me: Ace, nerdy, probably human. Jewish, white. May or may not have a gender. I'm an adult, please don't PM me if you are a minor. // About the blog: Largely Star Wars stuff (and also Venom at least for the moment), and various other nerd-type things. De vez en cuando escribo en español. "Las rebeliones se basan en la esperanza." - Cassian Andor

tags: In which N blogs about themself
summary: Rebuilding: A New Hope – newly edited
title: Rebuilding: A New Hope – newly edited
body:
This is not the first Rogue One fanfic I wrote, but it’s the most dear to me. I wrote it over a year ago, and it ended up sparking a loose series that I am still not done with yet.

After rewriting another story I’d written, which @dasakuryo was kind enough to point out had some very problematic implications, I decided to go back and rewrite the whole series, starting with the first story. About a month later, here are the results.

A New Hope

It was strange, Bodhi mused, coming back to his room and knowing that he would find Cassian there. That he would always find Cassian there. That he would still be there in the morning, every morning, without fail. There were no more missions, no more battles. No more sleepless nights spent worrying uselessly. No more mornings waking up feeling guilty for not having worried uselessly.

Cassian was safe. Bodhi was safe. The world they lived on was safe.

It was nice, of course. Bodhi wasn’t complaining. It was just strange. After so many years of chaos and war, he just wasn’t used to calm. The false calm of the eye of the storm, yes. Real calm, no.

Bodhi opened the door to his room, and, sure enough, Cassian was there. He sat on the floor, his back propped up against the bed,

a small purple capsule in his hand.

continue reading on AO3: A New Hope

(Note: You must be signed in to read this story. Trigger warnings for mention of addiction and suicidal ideation.)

blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

summary: Here come the Men in Black
title: Here come the Men in Black
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PcHvHA

by Toshi_Kun

·AO向
·半黑衣人au，单身趴体419梗
·部分nc-17
·ooc，发现文里有别的梗不是幻觉

这是宿醉，这绝对是该死的宿醉。欧比旺还是睁不开眼睛，他放弃了挣扎，任由自己趴在柔软的床上。这是多少年以来他头一次把自己喝成了这个样子，昨天喝了多少？大概……几瓶威士忌，可能还有些金酒。
哦不，以后一定要远离酒精。欧比旺保持趴着的姿势痛苦地想。黑衣人就不该把自己喝得醉醺醺的，这不专业，这一点都不MIB。不过话说回来，也正是因为他这么多年都没有沾过一滴酒，昨晚才会醉成这个样子。
叹了口气，欧比旺撑着自己的手臂想爬起来，但是手边突然出现的热源体一下就把他吓得趴了回去。
再次摔倒床垫上的时候欧比旺才意识到身体除了酸软无力外，还有些隐隐的疼痛从后面一个难以启齿的地方传了上来。这种场景怎么想怎么都像一夜纵欲过后吧！这种想象迫使欧比旺努力睁开沉重的眼皮，眼前的景象一下就把他吓得清醒了。
怎么还真是一夜纵欲。
他的旁边，居然睡着另一个人！一个男人！还是一个赤身裸体的陌生男人！而自己的手正搭在那个陌生人的胸膛上。

Words: 807, Chapters: 2/?, Language: 中文

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Satine Kryze, Qui-Gon Jinn, Mace Windu
  • Relationships: Obi-Wan Kenobi/Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: One Night Stands, Men In Black AU, MIB Obi-Wan, Past ObiTine, Past Anidala


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PcHvHA

title: [AO]Never Tell the Truth
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KQe3nn

by Louise2333

涉及摩尔X欧比旺，安纳金X欧比旺

一切始于一起谋杀案，费城黑帮头目达斯摩尔在家中惨遭腰斩，死者丈夫欧比旺与费城警方合作寻找凶手，作为重要线索和证人，欧比旺的安全需要保障，安纳金成了最佳人选。

Words: 581, Chapters: 1/?, Language: 中文

  • Fandoms: starwars
  • Rating: Not Rated

blog.name: nenad8
blog.title: Chapterhouse
blog.description:
“Before one can learn truth, one must unlearn lies" 
— from Traitor by Matthew Woodring Stover

summary: Ahsoka’s willingness to use the Force to help others and to follow her heart is one of the reasons why she is so beloved....
text: Ahsoka’s willingness to use the Force to help others and to follow her heart is one of the reasons why she is so beloved. Perhaps that is the real ‘will of the Force’; be true to yourself. The Sith and Jedi now seem like dead ends, with neither side truly able to achieve their ultimate ideology. So maybe Ahsoka has figured it out, though I just can’t see here sitting around like Bendu, especially if there is someone out there needing her help.

blog.name: brianmatthewwrong
blog.title: Don't Have A Soul On My Side

summary: Watched The Last Jedi for the first time since theaters last night (third time overall, saw it twice in theaters). Upon my first...
body:
Watched The Last Jedi for the first time since theaters last night (third time overall, saw it twice in theaters).

Upon my first viewing, I wasn’t sure what to think. But my opinion was solidified after watching it a second time - it has some pacing issues but is a really good Star Wars flick overall. I like that they went against the “norm” when it comes to Star Wars movies.

trail.content:
Watched The Last Jedi for the first time since theaters last night (third time overall, saw it twice in theaters).

Upon my first viewing, I wasn’t sure what to think. But my opinion was solidified after watching it a second time - it has some pacing issues but is a really good Star Wars flick overall. I like that they went against the “norm” when it comes to Star Wars movies.

blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: We Belong
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BbOoWJ

by butterfingers

Ben Solo has succeeded where many thought he would fail. As Kylo Ren he has lead the First Order for almost two years. But the person that was Kylo Ren is slipping away, leaving only a thin veneer for Ben Solo to hide behind. Tomorrow is a special day for Supreme Leader Kylo Ren and the First Order. At least it will be if Ben can stay alive. Hux has made his plans and Ben has made his counter-plans. But of course their deadly game goes to hell in a hand-basket when Rey shows up…and she’s angry. Angry enough to open the bond that they had ignored since she’d left him behind. Ben can’t resist her call and she’s just as crafty, powerful, and beautiful as ever.

So it was a bad idea for Ben to go after her, right?

Words: 1260, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Finn (Star Wars), Rose Tico, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Armitage Hux, Phasma (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Original Characters, Snoke (Star Wars), Knights of Ren, Force Ghost(s), Chewbacca, R2-D2 (Star Wars), C-3PO (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Finn/Rose Tico
  • Additional Tags: tasteful smut (hopefully), slowish burn


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BbOoWJ

so others that ive forgotten about in this list
title: An extremely generic message
body: Hi, I’m really bored and I want to start writing again. Do you like fanfic? I do. And I can write it. SO, I’m renovating my blog. This shit is about to turn into straight fandom. Just pop on over to my blog, give a follow, send in a request and I will write what you want to read. Over.

blog.title: A Distant Echo
blog.description:
This is my fanart blog. Here you will find all kind of fandom stuff. Mostly gay ships. Star Wars, Dragon Age, Mass Effect and other fun things.

Current obsession: Star Wars the Clone Wars/ Star Wars Rebels.

My Art Tag

Cinders Art Tag

summary: Quick doodle of Fives for my requests.  Do not copy, alter, reference or repost my art without my permission.  Reblogs and likes...
caption:

blog.name: pride-and-prejudice-in-space
blog.title: Opened self to dark side for a pair of pretty eyes
blog.description: Hello! My name is Lauren. I am a college student from the U.S. who loves Star Wars and Jane Austen.
